snippet: Many people in the United States who purchased tickets to the Olympics are still waiting to receive them less than two weeks before the opening ceremony on July 27.
abstract: Many people in the United States who purchased tickets to the London Olympics are still waiting to receive them less than two weeks before the opening ceremony on July 27; CoSport, company hired by the United States Olympic Committee to distribute tickets in the United States, blames the delay on call volume.
lead_paragraph: Many people in the United States who purchased tickets to the Olympics are still waiting to receive them less than two weeks before the opening ceremony on July 27.

headline.seo: Some Customers Have Yet to Receive Olympics Tickets
